alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:40AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nueces and south central San Patricio Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 540 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Texas Botanical Gardens, or 7 miles southwest of Corpus Christi, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Taft, Corpus Christi International Airport, Odem, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi Country Club, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Corpus Christi North Beach, Cabaniss Field, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Bay Area Medical Center, Cole Park, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Clarkwood, Annaville, Downtown Corpus Christi and La Palmera Mall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 17. US Highway 181 between mile markers 632 and 634, and between mile markers 644 and 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 654 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
